title: AI-Based Autonomous Navigation System
summary: Edge robotics prototype combining YOLO object detection, lane detection, HC-SR04 ultrasonic sensing and A* planning.

title: Real-time Vehicular Accident Detection & Emergency Response
summary: Sensor + camera based system to detect accidents in real-time and trigger emergency alerts (GSM/GPS integration).

title: Vybe Ride — JavaFX Ride-sharing UI
summary: JavaFX app prototype for a ride-sharing interface with login and ride selection flow.
